Uses of Package
io.fluo.api.client

  • Packages that use io.fluo.api.client 
    Package Description
    io.fluo.api.client  
    io.fluo.api.observer  
    io.fluo.api.types  
  • Classes in io.fluo.api.client used by io.fluo.api.client 
    Class and Description
    FluoAdmin
    Provides methods for initializing and administering a Fluo application.
    FluoAdmin.AlreadyInitializedException
    Exception that is thrown if Fluo application was already initialized.
    FluoAdmin.InitOpts
    Specifies Fluo initialization options such as clearing Zookeeper or existing Accumulo table.
    FluoAdmin.TableExistsException
    Exception that is thrown if Accumulo table (set by io.fluo.admin.accumulo.table) exists during initialization.
    FluoClient
    Client interface for Fluo.
    Loader
    Interface that is implemented by users to load data into Fluo.
    Loader.Context 
    LoaderExecutor
    Executes provided Loader objects to load data into Fluo.
    Snapshot
    Allows users to read from a Fluo table at a certain point in time.
    SnapshotBase
    Allows users to read from a Fluo table at a certain point in time
    Transaction
    Enables users to read and write to Fluo at a certain point in time.
    TransactionBase
    Enables users to read and write to a Fluo table at certain point in time.
  • Classes in io.fluo.api.client used by io.fluo.api.observer 
    Class and Description
    TransactionBase
    Enables users to read and write to a Fluo table at certain point in time.
  • Classes in io.fluo.api.client used by io.fluo.api.types 
    Class and Description
    Loader
    Interface that is implemented by users to load data into Fluo.
    Loader.Context 
    Snapshot
    Allows users to read from a Fluo table at a certain point in time.
    SnapshotBase
    Allows users to read from a Fluo table at a certain point in time
    Transaction
    Enables users to read and write to Fluo at a certain point in time.
    TransactionBase
    Enables users to read and write to a Fluo table at certain point in time.
